title: The Ascent - Taric Comic

embed.description: An exiled soldier ascends Mount Targon to find redemption, only to discover a higher calling.

body:
Behold! He's here!

Also Taric's Demacian now. Good to know.

EDIT: Here's an imgur courtesy of Moobeat of the cover art in glorious 1920x1080 resolution: http://imgur.com/rR05CO2

replies.body: Taric no longer a homosexual?

...Well first off he's never actually been described as homosexual, heterosexual, bisexual, pansexual or whatever in any lore. So him "no longer" being homosexual isn't actually a thing.

Secondly nothing here states anything pertaining to his sexual orientation and preference, so there's no indication as to how he swings, if at all. He could be Asexual for all we know.
Just so you should also know, he was always in Demacia (in the old lore, after he came from a different world he went to live in Demacia). On his champ page, its been saying he lives in Demacia.

No official lore ever said he was Demacian; his champion page just listed him as such. It was very little to go on considering this version of Taric's likely existed for not nearly as long as they've listed him as a Demacian champion.
He could identify as helicopter for all we know. As it's in in certain circles nowadays{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

YES!! HE'S STILL FABULOUS!!

I hope he has a likable personality.

But these comics really should have a way of being seen in the lore section, this in its own is really entertaining to view!

We haven't done just a few sentences for a new Champ in quite a while (though there has been some delays on some pieces of the written intros here and there). I'd love to know why you have that impression so we can do better for you in making the content more readily available. Is it due to issues with being able to view centrally housed content on the webpage? Or is it primarily from not having it contained within the client? Genuinely just trying to get feedback to help us as we think about doing a better job of making the introductory stories of our Champions more available. 

Also, I can assure you, the ChampUp and Promo teams have put together a good bit to reintroduce Taric.
All lore should be accessible via the client. Full stop.

*cough* Sol *cough*

Though I kinda assume once this rework is out, Sol'll have better lore? Does it contain spoilers and whatnot?

You can find Aurelion's introduction [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/mount-targon/aurelion-sol.html) and [here](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/aurelionsol/#champion-lorehttp://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/aurelionsol/#champion-lore)

Apparently there was an issue with the second section of Aurelion Sol's introductory tale on the main website, but you can see it on the specific Targon entry in the first link.
How does one simply miss a cosmic dragon?!
I sense a meme coming on ...

If you want feedback on the Targon lore, I have an entire thread for you with quite a number of very passionate people who go into quite some elaborate detail about their stances: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/IEw4TrBF-my-problems-with-targon

As for the impressions, the issue of course is the way you split stuff apart. The lore is PART of your game, so it is kinda mind-boggling why I wouldn't get the information about the characters when I have the game open. (That is, by the way, an issue not limited to the lore, there is a number of game-related information that is simply unavailable in the game client that really should be there, i.e. stat-scaling of abilities).

Plus, I'm sorry to say, the site-design is...kinda horrible. Not quite mtv.com-level but we're getting there. Like, if for instance I came to the opening website as a lore-fan who returned after a hiatus and I heard about "this Bilgewater-thingy" or wanted to read up on the lore in general...hell, let's say it like it is, I'm screwed. There's no search function, you have no archive and if there is a PM-function I have yet to figure out where it is or how it works...but at least the Tribunal still has a non-functioning link at the bottom of the page, I guess.

And again, this is not limited to lore. If I want to point out to other forum users that your company promised a non-draft-version of NCS, I have to do almost journalistic work to find the accomodating article.

And if google does a better job at making your content accesible than your own site...well, there's really no nice way of putting that, is there?

His lore will be big and beautiful, but it'll be on the website, not in the client. Go there for lore. In fact, go now, since you mentioned Poppy:

http://gameinfo.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/poppy/#champion-lore

You won this time :3

I'm glad he's kind.
I'm worried about giving him a redemption arc. Redemption stories can be good with someone working to atone in effective and meaningful ways. They can be bad with someone feeling guilt over something they had no control over, becoming an angsty annoyance who never actually does anything worth atonement. 
Additionally, with Narrative's history of 'RETCON BEFORE ENDING STORIES!' a redemption arc might never end, thus violating their stated goal of having stories that change.
